  • Method Details

    • newTurn

      @Deprecated public void newTurn()
      Deprecated.
      starts a new turn. increment turn number and set the playerPlayedInThisTurn to zero.

    • initializeNewTurn

      public void initializeNewTurn()
      Takes all actions necessary to begin the next turn:
      increments the turn counter, refills the clouds, reinitializes the board and all the users' selections

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase()
      Changes the turn phase to the next one (plan -> action; action -> plan) starts a new turn if the current phase is an action phase prepares the phase for the first player by calling startPlanningPhase or startActionPhase

    • endPlayerPhase

      public void endPlayerPhase()
      a player ends his phase. increment playersPlayedInThisTurn. Starts the next user's phase unless there should be a phase change This method will be called after endTurn or chooseAssistant

    • startPlanningPhase

      private void startPlanningPhase()
      Start a new player's PlanningPhase, now player in position 'playersPlayedInThisTurn' can play their planning phase

    • startActionPhase

      private void startActionPhase()
      Start a new player's ActionPhase, now player in position 'playersPlayedInThisTurn' can play their action phase

    • askForControl

      @Deprecated public boolean askForControl(Integer idUser, PhaseEnum gamePhase)
      Deprecated.
      Checks whether the player asking for control really has control
      Parameters:
      idUser - the id of the user asking to take control
      gamePhase - the phase of the game they're asking for
      Returns:
      true if the user can play their round in the phase specified

    • getCurrentPhase

      public PhaseEnum getCurrentPhase()
      Returns:
      The current game phase

    • isPhaseOver

      public boolean isPhaseOver()
      Returns:
      true if all players have played their phase

    • checkLastTurn

      public void checkLastTurn()
      check if the turn is going to start is the last one and modify the model with that value
